MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL16 and LL22 postcode area of Abergele and Denbigh, affecting properties in Llannefydd, Llanfairtalhairn and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulty locating the cause of the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.39PM on 8th November 2020
